${emailSignature}

Thank You for choosing ${resellerName}..!! 

We have received your payment of Rs.$!{paymentAmount}/- and we have enclosed the xml and summary of the ITR return to be filed for the AY $!{financialYear.displayAssessmentYear}. (FY $!{financialYearDisplay}).

For your ease link has been provided to upload your return and step by step guide to help you file your ITR on your own.

How to File your ITR

Step - 1

  • Login to https://incometaxindiaefiling.gov.in/e-Filing/UserLogin/LoginHome.html?nextPage=efile 
  • Your Login ID (i.e. PAN No.), Password and Date of Birth.

Step - 2

  • Select your ITR form (ITR1), Assessment Year (2013-14), Choose the xml File attached in this email (do not choose the summary)

Step - 3

  • Download the ITR V and please take printout of the same. It’s a password protected file Password is PAN no. in lower case followed by DOB without any space. (E.g. abcpd1234e01021990)

Step - 4

  • Post to “Income Tax Department - CPC, Post Bag No - 1, Electronic City Post Office, Bengaluru - 560100, Karnataka”, by ORDINARY POST OR SPEED POST ONLY.

For any query you can reach us. 

Thanks & Regards

${emailSignature}
Your Income Tax Return for Financial Year ${financialYearDisplay}

Dear Vendor,

                  You have got new ${serviceName} request .Please assist.

   Details of Service Requester as-

                                                           Name- ${serviceDoc.firstName} ${serviceDoc.lastName}

                                                           Email- ${serviceDoc.email} 

                                                           Mobile- ${serviceDoc.mobile} 

 

Thanks

Greetings from ${resellerName}..!!
 
Your payment has been verified. 
 
Details of your Payment 
Payment Mode: $!{paymentType} 
#if ($!{paymentType} == "CHECK")
Payment Type $!{paymentType}
Cheque No $!{checkNo}
Bank $!{checkBank}
Branch $!{checkBranch}
#elseif ($!{paymentType} == "CASH")

Contact Number $!{cashContactNumber}
Payment Best Time $!{cashBestTime}
#elseif ($!{paymentType} == "RTGS")
RTGS Date $!{rtgsDateStr}
RTGS Amount $!{rtgsAmount}
RTGS Time $!{rtgsTime}
RTGS Trans Number $!{rtgsTransNumber}
#end
 
You may login to ${memberHostName}  to download your xml and summary or you can even mail to your registered E-mail ID. 
 
Please read how to File ITR for a step by step guidance to file your ITR on your own.
 
For any assistance please be free to call us. 
 
Thanks,
 
${emailSignature}
